articles.title: Beekeepers urgently sought as Asian hornet reaches Ireland - BreakingNews.ie
articles.description: The Asian hornet preys on honeybees, wasps and other insects, and is responsible for the loss of almost 50 per cent of bee hives in some European regions.
articles.content:
